Articles.Content:
Name is supposed to be funny, as this is the weirdest plane i have EVER made, and somehow it works like a charm! I have noticed, it isn't that hard to spin out so be carefull.

The unique 4-engine design is not to be toyed with as it is very easy to screw up a plane entirely by doing this (I had to re-make the plane 5 or 6 times entirely to make it work)! Anyways, you want some pictures? FEAST YER EYES LADDIES!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This plane, is stupidly messed up, it works so well though, I don't even know what to say!

Download: http://www./download/04xf0oca04xz2lx/Whackjob_MK9001.craft

Oh to name a craft the same as a sorely missed and burned out neutron star of an engineer. I was expecting another cpu melting creation.

Coffee anyone?

Nice craft.
Fraudulent advertising for containing fewer than 103 parts.

Fraudulent advertising for containing fewer than 103 parts.

Agreed. Whackjobian creations should melt most computers.

very interesting. can we get some more angles of that nose?

hard to see from pics

I actually talked to Whackjob just the other day. He got burnt out on KSP for a little while after almost melting his computer. ADHD kicked in from there and he'd been dabbling in a bunch of other games. He said he's hoping to be back before 0.91 comes out.

On topic, I'm reasonably confident this does not meet the criteria to be considered 'Whackjobbian'.

very interesting. can we get some more angles of that nose?

hard to see from pics
